w:r.w:t: The teacher will teach vocabulary words associated with
. They will learn these words by using TPR, sentence frames, and vocabulary. Students will study these words and phrases: first, second, third, fourth, fifth, sixth, seventh, eighth, ninth, tenth
At the completion of this lesson, students will be able to:
Recognize, spell, and pronounce these target words associated with numbers and ordinals
Spell and pronounce common associated words
Use these sets of words in complete sentences
first, second, third, fourth, fifth, sixth, seventh, eighth, ninth, tenth, and this is
This slide will always be the
-branded opener slide that the teacher will display as the student enters the classroom.
